help-file.title: THARNADIA
help-file.content:
The sprawling metropolis of Tharnadia is the most active city in all of Duris. It is the cornerstone of the human economy and the jewel of their empire. Tharnadia can be found in the southwest corner of the continent, nestled against its broad and busy port.
Perhaps the most popular place to congregate in Tharnadia is the Ogre's Foot Inn. The inn is located roughly in the center of the city, directly in front of the city's constantly-bubbling fountain. To the west of the Inn you will find the city's resident cleric-physician, who will tend to your wounds for a small fee. Further west are the stairs to the Shr'nn Mesa, which leads to the city's prison -Caer Tannad. Upon further exploration you'll be happy to find many guild towers complete with shops and teachers, and also the main cargo port for Tharnadia lies here. The northenmost part of the city opens up to Tharnadia's port beaches, where one can take a casual stroll to take in the salty ocean air. Be careful there, though, the beach can be dangerous to those caught unaware. On the beach itself lies Bradistock Manor, famous for the haunting tales that keep many Tharnadian children awake at night. The southern part of the city is renowned for its seedy back-alleys, thugs and criminals. Far enough south, however, and the beach can once again be found leading to the lighthouse and Tranquility island. Leaving the Inn to the east going towards the gates of the city, you can't help but notice the sites and smells of the local Baazar. Travelers from all around stop to sample the wares sold here. North of the Baazar is a Bank and the magnificent Temple of the Paladins, where all are welcome to stop and rest up awhile. Before leaving the city make sure to stop and rent a mount for the journey for a trip across Goodie Continent can be a tiring one!
Traveling out of the city on the Grand Tharnadia Way you will pass through it's beautiful forest filled with a variety of animal life, ponds and walking trails.
